PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2025-01432025-02-17PCH
ActBroadcasting Act
PrecisRe-appointment of SANDRA MASON of Toronto, Ontario, as a director of the Board of Directors of the Canadian Broadcasting Corporation, to hold office during good behaviour for a term of five years, effective June 1, 2025.
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Re-appointment of SANDRA MASON of Toronto, Ontario, as a director of the Board of Directors of the Canadian Broadcasting Corporation, to hold office during good behaviour for a term of five years, effective June 1, 2025.
